🔒 I Like Android Privacy

On this page

🔒 I Like Android Privacy ​

READ THIS!

  • This page is simply everything listed on the old verison of the site ported over to this.
  • This page will not be updated with new links or new things added.

This is an archive.

What happened to privacy emojis?

They have not been ported over yet.

Android Adblocking ​

  • ⭐ AdGuard - Ad-blocker app.
  • AdAway - Open Source ad-blocker for Android.
  • Blokada - Open Source ad-blocking/tracker/malware app.
  • InviZible Pro - Android app for online privacy and security.
  • personalDNSfilter - DNS Ad-blocker.

Android App Store ​

  • ⭐ F-Droid - FOSS application catalogue for Android.
  • ⭐ Droid-ify - Material F-Droid client.
  • ⭐ Obtainium - App Updates Directly From the Source.
  • Accrescent - App store focused on security, privacy, and usability.

Android Browsers ​

  • ⭐ Cromite - Bromite fork with privacy enhancements.
  • ⭐ Tor Browser - Private, secure, onion-routing Android browser.
  • ⭐ Mull - A privacy hardened browser.
  • DuckDuckGo Private Browser - Privacy-focused web browser.

Android Encryption ​

  • DroidFS - Store & access your files securely.
  • EDS Lite - Virtual disk encryption.

Android Maps ​

  • ⭐ Organic Maps - Navigate with Privacy - Community-Driven & Open-Source.
  • OsmAnd~ - Global Mobile Map Viewing & Navigation for Offline and Online OSM Maps.

Android Messaging ​

  • ⭐ Briar - Secure messaging app.
  • ⭐ Signal - Privacy-focused messaging app with end-to-end encryption.
  • Telegram - Cloud-based messaging app. Featuring encrypted chats, groups, and channels.
  • Threema - Secure messaging app that prioritizes privacy.

Android VPN ​

  • ⭐ Orbot - TOR VPN.
  • ⭐ Vpnify - Free VPN.
  • AdGuard VPN - Free VPN.
  • Riseup VPN - Free VPN.
  • Mullvad VPN - Paid VPN.

Android Two-Factor Authentication ​

  • ⭐ Aegis - Open Source, Secure Authenticator for Android.
  • Ente - 2FA app for Android.
  • Authenticator Pro - Open Source 2FA app for Android.
  • Google Authenticator - 2FA app made by Google.

Android App Permission Managers ​

  • TrackerControl - Permission Manager.
  • Permission Pilot - Permission Manager.
  • Yivi - Permission Manager.
  • Exodus - Permission Manager.
  • HideDroid - Permission Manager.

Android Health Apps ​

  • ⭐ FitoTrack - Privacy oriented fitness tracker.
  • ⭐ Paseo - Open source step counting app.
  • AAT - GPS-tracking app for sportive activities, with emphasis on cycling.
  • openWorkout - Privacy oriented workout trainer.

Android Password Managers ​

  • ⭐ Bitwarden - Open-source password manager for storing sensitive information securely.
  • ⭐ KeePassDX - KeePass implementation for Android.
  • LastPass - Password manager and password generator that locks your passwords and personal information in a secure vault.

Android Firewall Apps ​

  • ⭐ NetGuard - Easily control internet access for apps, with no rooting required.
  • ⭐ AFWall+ - Android Firewall - iptables front-end.
  • NoRoot Firewall - Firewall app for non-rooted Android devices.

Android Anti-Malware Apps ​

  • ⭐ Malwarebytes Security - Malware scanner and removal tool.
  • Avast Antivirus - Antivirus and security tool.
  • Bitdefender Antivirus - Antivirus and malware removal app.

Android Privacy-focused Keyboards ​

  • AnySoftKeyboard - Android (f/w) keyboard that supports multi-language, T9, and custom layout.
  • OpenBoard - Fork of the AOSP keyboard.
  • Simple Keyboard - Simple Keyboard is a keyboard application for Android devices.

Android Cameras ​

  • ObscuraCam - Privacy camera app by Guardian Project.
  • Open Camera - Fully featured and completely free Camera app for Android phones and tablets.

Android Privacy-focused Email Clients ​

  • ⭐ ProtonMail - Secure email based in Switzerland.
  • Tutanota - End-to-end encrypted email service.
  • FairEmail - Fully featured, open-source email app.

Android Calendar Apps ​

  • Etar - Open-source material designed calendar, for everyone!
  • Simple Calendar - A simple calendar with events, customizable widgets and no ads.
  • DAVx⁵ - Manage your calendars and contacts using CalDAV and CardDAV.

Android Notes Apps ​

  • Standard Notes - A simple and private notes app.
  • Joplin - Open-source note-taking app.
  • Carnet - A free and open-source note taking and personal journal app with a Markdown editor.

Android Privacy-focused Social Media Apps ​

  • ⭐ Minds - Crypto social network that puts users first.
  • ⭐ Vero - True social. No ads. No algorithms.
  • MeWe - Next-gen social network.

Android Parental Control Apps ​

  • ⭐ Qustodio - Parental control and monitoring software with a strong focus on privacy.
  • ⭐ FamilyTime - Parental control app that helps parents monitor and manage their children’s device usage.
  • Norton Family - Parental control software by NortonLifeLock with privacy features.
